main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over North Korea on 9 June 1952.
interesting points: The object was first sighted at an altitude of approximately 40,000 feet., The object appeared to be spherical in shape and was described as luminous or phosphorescent., The size of the object was estimated to be approximately 7,000 yards in diameter., The observation lasted for a period of approximately 45 minutes., The conclusion indicated that the object was not identified and any further information was purely speculative.
